snippet: SIROTA--Dr. David King. We send our love and condolences to Teddy, Miriam and Elliot. David was a good friend to us in our time of need. Goodbye dear friend. Barbara Klein Asselta, Amanda & Philip Miller, Andrew & Maggie Sheppard, Tina & Thomas Duffy 1/3
lead_paragraph: SIROTA--Dr. David King. We send our love and condolences to Teddy, Miriam and Elliot. David was a good friend to us in our time of need. Goodbye dear friend. Barbara Klein Asselta, Amanda & Philip Miller, Andrew & Maggie Sheppard, Tina & Thomas Duffy 1/3
